Download


Main JARs

All the main Dandelion-DataTables JAR can be found in the Maven Central Repository


Dependencies

You can download the Dandelion-DataTables dependencies using e.g. http://search.maven.org or http://mvnrepository.com/.

  • slf4j-api-1.6.4.jar : using mvnrepository | using search.maven

  • commons-lang-2.6.jar : download using mvnrepository | using search.maven

  • commons-beanutils-1.8.3.jar : download using mvnrepository | using search.maven

  • json-simple-1.1.1.jar : download using mvnrepository | using search.maven
